contents:
胡叼盤呢，只不過是習禁評Wolf Warrior Diplomacy(戰狼外交)大棋局中的一枚棋子罷了，參見胡叼盤所主持的坏毬屎報發表的如下文章：
West feels challenged by China’s new ‘Wolf Warrior’ diplomacy
https://www.globaltimes(dot) cn/content/1185776.shtml

習禁評親自指揮親自佈署的China’s Wolf Warrior Diplomacy(支式戰狼外交)正在鯨吞蠶食著西方世界陣營，詳見大不列顛禮拜日泰晤士報的報道：
China’s ‘wolf warrior’ diplomats sink teeth into the West  World
https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/beijings-wolf-warrior-diplomats-snarl-at-the-west-37trl905b
